entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:20 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: W 15 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
